overview: From 2025-11-30 to 2025-12-07, elizaos-plugins/plugin-mcp had 1 new PRs (1 merged), 0 new issues, and 3 active contributors.

topPRs.title: feat: enhance MCP provider with mcpText field and improve tool response handling
topPRs.author: 0xbbjoker
topPRs.body:
- Add optional mcpText field to McpProvider values for formatted MCP configuration
- Update buildMcpProviderData to include mcpText in provider values
- Change handleToolResponse to return Memory object instead of void
- Enhance callToolAction return to include reasoned response text and tool output
- Initialize mcpProvider with mcpText field in McpService constructor

This improves the data available to consumers and enables better tracking
of tool execution responses throughout the action lifecycle.

<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
---

> [!NOTE]
> Adds `mcpText` to `McpProvider.values` and updates tool handling to return a `Memory` with the reasoned response, surfacing it and tool output in action results.
> 
> - **MCP Provider data**
>   - Add optional `values.mcpText` to `McpProvider` (`types.ts`).
>   - Initialize `mcpProvider` with `mcpText` in `McpService` (`service.ts`).
>   - `buildMcpProviderData` now populates `values.mcp`, `values.mcpText`, and `text` (`utils/mcp.ts`).
> - **Tool handling**
>   - Change `handleToolResponse` to return `Promise<Memory>` and return the created reply memory (`utils/processing.ts`).
>   - `callToolAction` captures the returned memory and includes the reasoned response text in the action `text`; also adds `output` to `values`/`data` (`actions/callToolAction.ts`).
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 902eb38a4779ae148345c5925f415af82a17ba90. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Tool responses now display detailed reasoning in success messages.
  * System now captures and stores full MCP configuration text for reference.

* **Bug Fixes**
  * Improved tool response handling to properly include output details in return values.

<sub>✏️ Tip: You can customize this high-level summary in your review settings.</sub>

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
